data.eml:eml: Sedum ichangensis, a new species of Crassulaceae from Hubei, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Yu-Bing, Xiong, Xing-Jun (2019): Sedum ichangensis, a new species of Crassulaceae from Hubei, China. PhytoKeys 132: 91-98, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.132.35428, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.132.35428
